value:
All this New Year's food looks so
delicious! I want to learn how to make
it so I can cook it for my brothers.

I brought this otter from Niðavellir! It
looks a little bit like Ótr, doesn't it?

Look! Fáfnir gave me some money
as a New Year's gift. Hmm...I think
I'll save it!

I drew my fortune 10 times in a row
and got the worst luck every time...
Huh? I'm only supposed to take one?

This is called a kimono? It's so frilly
and cute! I'm going to go show my
brothers!

Happy New Year! We are all
celebrating over at
$Nf's castle!

I have a feeling I'll be really lucky this
year. This just confirms it!

I can still get so much stronger! The
person I am this year will be even
better than I was the year before!

*sigh* I must have eaten too much
mochi. I'm so full I can barely move...

This is for me? Thank you so much!
With this, I can be an even stronger
ally for you this year!

I'm Reginn! Happy New Year! I plan
on enjoying this next year in Askr
to the absolute fullest!

$Nu...$k$pUmm, I have something to ask you.$k$pI overhead people saying that your
first dream of the year becomes
reality. Is...is that true?$k$pLast night I dreamed that I was
celebrating the New Year in a cozy
room with my brothers.$k$pWe promised we would all get along
and work together again, like a family.
They were even smiling!$k$pI hope that will become reality. But
hoping only does so much. I have to
work to make this dream come true.$k$pWill you help make my New Year's
dream come to pass? You will? Yay!
Let's work hard together this year!
たあっ
おめでとう！
ひゃあっ！
失敗なの…
The time has come!
To another great year!
A New Year's gift!
Feeling lucky?!
Off to a bad start...
Hehe
Happy New Year! Let's make this year just as fun as last year!
*startle* Ugh! Even when I'm dressed up, I can't keep the refined act going all that long...
So, that huge stack of mochi over there... Is that...decoration? Or are we going to eat it? It's making me hungry...
Since it's a new year, I fixed up my Gullinbursti so it's sparkling!
Time for my New Year's fortune! ...All right, let's see... Huh. The worst possible luck.
Do you think my brothers will give me New Year's gifts? *giggle* I can't wait!
This next year, we'll do everything together, right? It'll be the best year ever!
You got it!
Well, umm...
Let the fireworks begin!
